name: Zildjian 65 Escape From Randy Orton
description:
You are in a wrestling arena and you must find Lemmy Kilmister before being caught by Randy Orton. 

Why this game exists? 

Last week  I've been interviewed by the podcaster Zildjian 65 and during the interview he asked if I could make a game about him. This is the result of his joke. xD
